```tsx
■fn_start
// Confirming with the user the fetched Order ID before proceeding with deletion
yield <Message type="prompt">
  I have fetched your order ID: **O666**. Do you confirm that you want to delete this order?
  <Button action="postback" label="Yes, delete it" value="confirm_delete_O666" />
  <Button action="postback" label="No, keep it" value="cancel_delete_O666" />
</Message>
return { action: 'listen' }
